name: AcuteMyocardialInfarctionI9
title: Acute Myocardial Infarction I9
description: Yale AMI Mortality de novo measure
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains diagnoses used to identify with an active diagnosis of acute myocardial infarction.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify an active diagnosis of AMI. The QDM Category linked to this value set: Condition / Diagnosis / Problem),(Inclusion Criteria: All diagnosis codes describing an active AMI  utilizing ICD 9 CM codes.),(Exclusion Criteria: The value set specifically excludes for Acute Atrial Infarction; also exclude codes that do not meet the inclusion criteria.)
